customer reviews

Charles Martin
2 half marathon
Didn't know what to buy, so I contacted the guys from RunSmart. They helped me choose a heart rate monitor that fit my goals and budget. After some time, I decided to update my gadget and didn't hesitate to contact them again.

New goals - new instrument!

Thanks, RunSmart!
James Brown
1 half marathon
This heart rate monitor is a great thing. I used to run without one, and it turns out I was only making things worse for myself. I bought a heart rate monitor and even got a free workout as a gift. They did the first workout with me and taught me how to use my new gadget. They also explained the basics of anatomy and made me a training plan for a month ahead.

I prepared for my first half marathon with them! Thank you!!!
Patricia Taylor
2 half marathon
I couldn't start running for a long time, because I had started several times before, but it became difficult and I gave up. I heard from friends about RunSmart and about running with heart rate control and decided to give it a try.

I called the store and the staff immediately asked about my running goals. They helped me find a great pair of sneakers at a discounted price! Now I enjoy running every day! I've already run 2 half marathons and several shorter races, and I'm not planning to stop! Thank you so much for helping me choose the right shoes! I recommend this store to everyone!

Thanks!!!
Germany, Berlin, 12596
